invariants: Bundle content is a direct publication wrapper around provided CFO JSON blocks and enforcement contract text, without redesign.
Fail-closed enforcement is normative; missing inputs yield NEEDS_INPUT per reason codes.
All targets in success_criteria are ranges (bands over points).

company_profile.growth_narrative_requirement: Maintain credible growth story while reaching breakeven within 12 months
company_profile.board_mandate: Breakeven in 12 months (define metric explicitly) without breaking growth narrative

decision_objective.primary: Achieve breakeven within 12 months via governed triggers and phased operating plan
secondary: Preserve or improve retention and product momentum
Maintain pipeline health and predictable revenue growth

breakeven_definition_options.definition: Operating cash flow - capex >= 0 over trailing 3-month average

arr_to_revenue_recognition_lag.description: Assume revenue ~ ARR on run-rate basis

opex_current_usd_per_month.notes: All-in operating expenses excluding COGS; placeholder until actuals loaded

net_burn_current_usd_per_month.notes: Placeholder; actuals to replace in first operating cycle

cash_on_hand_usd.notes: Unknown; must be filled to calibrate runway triggers

revenue_levers: NRR improvement via churn reduction + expansion motions
cost_levers: GTM efficiency (CAC payback, quota capacity right-sizing)
R&D focus (reduce non-core spend, improve release ROI)
Cloud/infra and COGS optimization (without GM degradation)

non_negotiables: Do not materially degrade customer experience or retention
Do not cut roadmap items tied to retention/NRR
Maintain credible growth guidance supported by leading indicators
No fake precision: all targets expressed as ranges and verified monthly
guardrails: NRR must not fall below defined floor
Pipeline coverage must not fall below defined floor
Gross margin must not fall below defined floor

deliverables_from_this_run: Trigger specification (what to measure, formulas, windows, actions)
Gating rules (what is allowed/blocked by signal state)
Outcome contract (definitions, cadence, owners, reporting, escalation)
Board memo draft (decision narrative + plan + risks)

triggers.name: FCF trajectory to breakeven
triggers.formula: FCF_3mo_avg = avg(OperatingCashFlow - Capex) over last 3 months; TrajectoryGap = FCF_3mo_avg - TargetFCF_3mo_avg(month_index)
triggers.measurement_window: Trailing 3-month average, evaluated monthly at close
action_if_pass: Allow planned growth investments within gated budget bands
Maintain hiring plan for roles already pre-approved by gate
action_if_fail: Immediate spend containment: freeze non-essential hiring and backfills
Reduce discretionary spend 10–20% next month (tools/contractors/marketing experiments)
Re-forecast within 5 business days; escalate to Board chair if two consecutive fails
triggers.variance_notes: Use bands not point targets; allow seasonality and billing swings; reconcile with working capital movements

triggers.name: EBITDA trajectory to breakeven (alternate definition)
triggers.formula: EBITDA_3mo_avg = avg(Revenue - COGS - Opex excl D&A) over last 3 months; TrajectoryGap = EBITDA_3mo_avg - TargetEBITDA_3mo_avg(month_index)
triggers.measurement_window: Trailing 3-month average, evaluated monthly at close
action_if_pass: Permit growth experiments if other guardrails pass
Continue roadmap items classified as retention-critical
action_if_fail: Trigger cost actions: pause low-ROI programs; reallocate to retention and proven channels
Implement approval gate for any new vendor spend >$5k/month
triggers.variance_notes: EBITDA ignores working capital; pair with cash triggers (T4/T5) to avoid cash surprises

triggers.name: Rule of 40 guardrail (growth narrative)
action_if_pass: Use Ro40 in external narrative and board reporting as primary efficiency signal
action_if_fail: Shift emphasis to efficiency story; cut/reshape lowest ROI acquisition spend
Mandate pricing/packaging review and discount controls within 30 days
triggers.variance_notes: Bands reflect market variability; select benchmark band by segment and growth stage

triggers.name: Cash runway floor
triggers.measurement_window: Trailing 3-month burn average, evaluated weekly and monthly
action_if_pass: Proceed with phased plan; keep optionality for selective investment
action_if_fail: Activate defensive plan: hiring freeze, renegotiate major vendors, cut discretionary spend 15–25%
Consider financing/strategic options exploration if fails for 4 consecutive weeks
triggers.variance_notes: Runway depends on burn volatility; use 3-month avg and also a high-burn stress case (+20–30%)

triggers.name: NRR floor (do-not-break retention)
triggers.measurement_window: Monthly cohort-based, evaluated monthly; also 3-month rolling average
action_if_pass: Maintain planned product/customer success investments tied to retention
action_if_fail: Protect CS/product capacity; pause risky changes; run churn war-room within 7 days
Reallocate GTM spend from new logo to retention until back above 100–105%
triggers.variance_notes: NRR varies by segment; thresholds should be calibrated to historical distribution

triggers.name: Pipeline coverage for next-quarter bookings
triggers.measurement_window: Weekly snapshot; evaluate weekly trend (4-week moving average)
action_if_pass: Maintain demand gen and SDR capacity; focus on conversion improvements
action_if_fail: Stop unproven channels; redirect to pipeline creation with best historical ROI
Revise bookings target or re-segment focus within 2 weeks
triggers.variance_notes: Coverage needed depends on win rates and cycle length; calibrate quarterly

triggers.name: CAC payback discipline
triggers.measurement_window: Quarterly cohort-based; updated monthly with trailing 3-month smoothing
action_if_pass: Allow scaling of efficient segments/channels within gate
action_if_fail: Reduce acquisition spend 10–30% in failing segments; tighten ICP and qualification
Enforce discount ceilings and pricing governance immediately
triggers.variance_notes: Payback is lagging; pair with leading indicators (conversion rates, ASP, sales cycle)

triggers.name: Gross margin floor
action_if_pass: Continue investments; pursue infra optimization roadmap
action_if_fail: Launch COGS taskforce: cloud commitments, arch efficiency, support cost review
Pause low-margin offerings/custom deals unless approved by CFO
triggers.variance_notes: Account for usage spikes and one-time credits; normalize where appropriate

breakeven_in_12_months.description: Monthly target path for EBITDA or FCF to reach >=0 by month 12 using bands, not point targets

principles: Fail-closed: if any critical guardrail fails, block discretionary growth spend and net-new headcount
Protect retention: never cut retention-critical CS/Product capacity when NRR trigger is watch/fail
Reallocate before cutting: shift from low-ROI acquisition to retention and proven channels first
Bands over points: decisions based on ranges and multi-signal corroboration

allowed_if.allow: Proceed with approved hiring plan; add up to +1–2 critical roles/month if Ro40 is PASS and CAC payback is PASS
Backfills only + explicitly retention-critical roles; CFO approval required

blocked_if.block: All net-new hires and non-critical backfills; exception requires CEO+CFO signoff and written ROI case

exceptions.retention_protection: If T5 is WATCH/FAIL, CS/Product roles that directly mitigate churn are allowed even during cost containment, but must be offset by cuts elsewhere

gates.scope: Marketing + sales variable spend, tools, agencies

allowed_if.when: T7_CAC_PAYBACK PASS and T6_PIPELINE_COVERAGE PASS and (T1 or T2) is PASS/WATCH
allowed_if.allow: Scale spend +5–15% in proven segments; keep experiment budget capped (2–5% of GTM spend)

blocked_if.block: Freeze scaling; cut lowest ROI channels 10–30%; require channel-level ROI proof for reinstatement
Immediate discretionary GTM spend freeze except for commitments; re-approve monthly

required_controls: Discount governance: set discount ceilings by segment; CFO approval for exceptions
Quota capacity check: ensure rep capacity aligns with pipeline coverage thresholds

allowed_if.allow: Prioritize retention-critical roadmap; limit new big-bet initiatives to those with quantified retention or upsell impact

blocked_if.block: Pause non-core R&D; focus on cost-to-serve, reliability, and upsell enablers
Block any roadmap that risks churn; mandate churn-reduction tiger team and reliability focus

gates.scope: All non-labor spend (software, cloud commitments, contractors outside product)

allowed_if.allow: Renewals allowed; new spend requires ROI case if >$5k/month

blocked_if.block: Renegotiate top vendors; approve only mission-critical spend; target 10–20% savings within 60 days

escalation_rules.condition: Two consecutive monthly FAILs on T1/T2
escalation_rules.action: Board-level review; adopt stronger cost program; revise guidance narrative

escalation_rules.condition: Four consecutive weekly FAILs on T4
escalation_rules.action: Activate financing/strategic options workstream; implement immediate burn reduction plan

breakeven_definition_selected.selection_rule: Use FCF as primary; report EBITDA as secondary; if cash volatility is high, emphasize EBITDA trajectory plus runway floor

agenda: Trigger dashboard (T4 runway, T6 pipeline, spend vs budget)
Actions from last week and owners

deliverables: Decision log of gate exceptions and ROI outcomes
monthly.timing: Within 7 business days of month-end close

deliverables: Strategic tradeoffs and next-quarter gated budget

minimum_fields: ARR bridge (start, new, expansion, contraction, churn)
Opex by function (R&D, S&M, G&A) and fixed vs variable
Pipeline stages and definitions; bookings target
Headcount by function; fully-loaded cost assumptions

data_quality_sla.crm_hygiene: Stage definitions enforced; required fields for qualification

fail_closed_policy.default_state: If any critical trigger is FAIL, system enters DEFENSIVE mode until two consecutive PASS cycles
defensive_mode_actions: Weekly cash focus and collections push
Reallocation of GTM spend to proven ROI or retention

invariants: Fail-closed ingress and enforcement per RUNTIME-A1..A10.
Decision logging is a hard stop (no log => REJECTED).
runtime_enforcement_contract.content_md:
# Runtime Enforcement Contract v1 (CFO) — vsf-TEST-CFO-001

(Verbatim contract is published at docs/enforcement/vsf-TEST-CFO-001/runtime_enforcement_contract_v1.md)

reason_codes_taxonomy.CFO-03: Wrong root shape / missing expected root object (REJECTED)
reason_codes_taxonomy.CFO-07: Units mismatch between triggers and outcome criteria (REJECTED)
reason_codes_taxonomy.CFO-12: Missing cash inputs for runway computation at runtime (NEEDS_INPUT)
reason_codes_taxonomy.CFO-16: Missing inputs for CRITICAL trigger evaluation (NEEDS_INPUT)
reason_codes_taxonomy.CFO-17: Missing inputs for NON-critical trigger evaluation (NEEDS_INPUT)
reason_codes_taxonomy.CFO-22: GTM spend request missing required details (NEEDS_INPUT)
reason_codes_taxonomy.CFO-25: Roadmap approval risks churn while T5 FAIL (REJECTED)
reason_codes_taxonomy.CFO-27: Vendor approval under low runway without mission-critical justification (REJECTED)
reason_codes_taxonomy.CFO-28: Not entering DEFENSIVE mode on critical FAIL (REJECTED)
reason_codes_taxonomy.CFO-29: Exiting DEFENSIVE mode without two PASS cycles (REJECTED)
reason_codes_taxonomy.CFO-30: Escalation event not emitted when condition met (REJECTED)
reason_codes_taxonomy.CFO-32: Close timeliness outside SLA but treated as final (REJECTED)
reason_codes_taxonomy.CFO-33: CRM hygiene insufficient for pipeline-based gating (NEEDS_INPUT)
reason_codes_taxonomy.CFO-35: Retention exception without offset cuts documented (REJECTED)

escalations_emitted.rule: Two consecutive monthly FAILs on T1/T2
